This is the best Airbnb we've ever encountered!

Later, after our boat ride around Lake James (Lori can hook you up), we joined Lori and Patrick on the upper deck (there are three decks including one just outside the apartment door and exclusively ours - although we enjoyed chatting and joking with Lori and Patrick.
Five stars is not enough! We were celebrating our 55th wedding anniversary, We honeymooned on Lake James and wanted to reprise the experience. We had a fabulous honeymoon on Lake James 55 years ago and, thanks to Lori, we had a fabulous 55th anniversary!
